actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a deduction from gross income based upon the cost of living in certain States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax deduction equal to the percentage of their total allowable personal exemptions which equals the percentage by which their State's cost of living exceeds the national average. Disallows application of this deduction to Federal pay and allowances.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a deduction from gross income based upon the cost of living in certain States.
